title: [CANT USE SKIN]
body:
So my friend gifted me championship riven awhile ago but when I go to use it, it says I need to purchase it. I've tried restarting the client but I still don't have it unlocked 
http://imgur.com/AMA87nB
http://imgur.com/BXbD8i1

replies.body:
Hey there! 

If content is removed, its not usually due to an error regarding the account. Typically, it's in the case of a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If you believe that content you have received on your account has gone missing and is not because of this (you could check with your friend!) make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can look into your account and investigate further!
also what should i submit that ticket under?
thank you i will ask them when they are on
lol i gift a lot of people dont get gifted to often myself though
